1a1(mdo 'grel): @##/
1b1(mdo 'grel): /rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa bing sha ti sa ha sri ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta / bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang
1b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang / /'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis
1b3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang / /gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa / /nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum
1b4(mdo 'grel): de la phyag 'tshal / /rgyal sras gang dag skye bo ma lus bsgral phyir byang chub tu ni yid byas dang / /so sor byang chub rtogs nas gang dag slar yang mnyam med sgom par byed rnams dang / /slob ma
1b5(mdo 'grel): dang ni slob ma'i lam 'gro nyon mongs zil mnan 'gro ba gang yin pa/ /de dag thams cad dam pa'i chos mnyan phyir na rab dga'i yid kyis 'dir spyon cig /gang phyir dri ma mang pos dus 'di de
2a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin ma yin 'gro ba 'di yin zhing / /lta ba mchog tu mi legs chags sdang mun pa rab tu lhag gyur mi g.yo la/ /tshe yang ring po med dang mun pas dri bral snang ba bzang po dang ldan pas / /the tshom yul min mdo 'di
2a2(mdo 'grel): kye ma rnyed dka' bas na rig par bdag gis dbye/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa na bzhugs te/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
2a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/
2a4(mdo 'grel): khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa rnams dang
2a5(mdo 'grel): thabs cig go/ /gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen ma dang /
2b1(mdo 'grel): dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba dag dang yang thabs cig go/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi
2b2(mdo 'grel): rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyis bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang
2b3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ grags pa dang / khe dang bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag
2b4(mdo 'grel): par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ sngon du smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su
2b5(mdo 'grel): brjod pa mkhas pa/ zhum pa'i sems dang bral ba/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis mnan pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas pa las nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang /
2b6(mdo 'grel): rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bur lhag par mos pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa phra mo sna tshogs la 'jug par mkhas pa/ sems can
2b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa mtha' yas par smon pa dang 'jug pa yongs su gzung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na
3a1(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs dang bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs
3a2(mdo 'grel): pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsen pa brgyad stong mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ 'di lta ste skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
3a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon dam pa dang / skyes bus byin dang / chus byin dang / dbang pos byin dang / blo gros dam pa dang / khyad par blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel ba dang / don yod mthong ba dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang /
3a4(mdo 'grel): rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / mi gtong brtson pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / blo gros dpe med pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / mthu chen thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag
3a5(mdo 'grel): na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs cig go/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan seng ge'i khri bshams
3a6(mdo 'grel): nas/ sku drang por bsrangs te dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad khongs su chud pas 'du ba dang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
3a7(mdo 'grel): par gzhag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ lha'i spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la rnam par gzigs so/ /de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad las 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi
3b1(mdo 'grel): mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs long bu gnyis dang / zhabs byin pa gnyis dang / zhabs
3b2(mdo 'grel): pus mo gnyis dang / zhabs brla gnyis dang / sku lta zur gnyis dang / sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / sku rtsib logs gnyis dang / thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /phyag gi sor
3b3(mdo 'grel): mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang / dpung pa gnyis dang / mgur dang / tshems mche ba bzhi dang / tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan gnyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang /
3b4(mdo 'grel): smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / steng gi spyi gtsug dang / zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad
3b5(mdo 'grel): snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
3b6(mdo 'grel): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
3b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /'od zer des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
4a1(mdo 'grel): khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang /
4a2(mdo 'grel): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad
4a3(mdo 'grel): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od gang yin pa des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad pa dang /
4a4(mdo 'grel): phyogs bcu po rnams thams cad kyi phyogs re rer/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rang bzhin gyi 'od des khyab par mdzad nas/ 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i bar du
4a5(mdo 'grel): gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang po des khyab par mdzad nas/ ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od rab tu bkye ste/ 'od de las 'od zer bye
4a6(mdo 'grel): ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon to/ /'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa byung bar [##]gyur to/ /pad+mo de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos ston par mdzad cing gnas pa rnams bzhugs te/ 'di
4a7(mdo 'grel): lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad do/ /de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston
4b1(mdo 'grel): to/ /de bzhin du de dag lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas
4b2(mdo 'grel): kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng
4b3(mdo 'grel): ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de lta bu'i gzugs kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
4b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go/ /rab tu ldeg go/ /kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ /chem/ rab tu chem/ kun tu rab tu chem mo/ /
4b5(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba
4b6(mdo 'grel): bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gang dag yod pa de dag rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur to/ /mi khom
4b7(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad kyang zad par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las shi 'phos pa de dag kyang dang ba dang rab tu dga' ba de nyid kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rgyal chen
5a1(mdo 'grel): bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mthus sngon gyi
5a2(mdo 'grel): tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas dang ba dang rab tu dga' bas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de bzhin du shar
5a3(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs bcu po rnams kun tu phyogs kyi cha re rer 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
5a4(mdo 'grel): snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can gang dag dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
5a5(mdo 'grel): gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas shi 'phos pa de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /mi dang lha rnams su skyes pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mthus sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dang ba dang rab tu dga' ba
5a6(mdo 'grel): de nyid kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung bar gyur pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thams cad thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'dud par gyur to/ /
5a7(mdo 'grel): de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par
5b1(mdo 'grel): gyur to/ /sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang sems rtse gcig pa thob par gyur to/ /gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/ /skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/ /
5b2(mdo 'grel): nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to/ /lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams
5b3(mdo 'grel): kyang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na/ pha dang / ma dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' ba dang / gnyen dang / grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems
5b4(mdo 'grel): kyis phan tshun sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang
5b5(mdo 'grel): ldan par gyur to/ /'di lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin dang ldan par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na
5b6(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dul ba ni legs so/ /zhi ba ni legs so/ /yang dag par sdom pa ni legs so/ /yun ring du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs so/ /srog chags su gyur pa rnams la mi 'tshe ba ni legs so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du
5b7(mdo 'grel): brjod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma sgrib pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/ zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab
6a1(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs
6a2(mdo 'grel): na/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes
6a3(mdo 'grel): shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
6a4(mdo 'grel): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham
6a5(mdo 'grel): me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas
6a6(mdo 'grel): pa ni mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang
6a7(mdo 'grel): bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang bcas pa dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong
6b1(mdo 'grel): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba bzhin du bstan to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
6b2(mdo 'grel): byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / 'thab bral dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la
6b3(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa mthong nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la
6b4(mdo 'grel): dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma li'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom
6b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug spos dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan d+hi dang / me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma li'i lo ma dang /
6b6(mdo 'grel): lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig
6b7(mdo 'grel): yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sogs pa dang / na bza'
7a1(mdo 'grel): dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong
7a2(mdo 'grel): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du red de gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/ /mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/ /rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/ /me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi
7a3(mdo 'grel): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger gyur te / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ci lta ba de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig
7a4(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re
7a5(mdo 'grel): zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin
7a6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams
7a7(mdo 'grel): kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
7b1(mdo 'grel): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu dgye bar mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
7b2(mdo 'grel): 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab
7b3(mdo 'grel): tu snang bar gyur to/ /'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
7b4(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong
7b5(mdo 'grel): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /
7b6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang
7b7(mdo 'grel): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po rnams mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
8a1(mdo 'grel): de dag na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge
8a2(mdo 'grel): 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya
8a3(mdo 'grel): ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing / 'tsho la skyong bar byed de/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di nyid ston
8a4(mdo 'grel): par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan
8a5(mdo 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol
8a6(mdo 'grel): to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
8a7(mdo 'grel): chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na
8b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas
8b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
8b3(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/
8b4(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas
8b5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de
8b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+ma 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs
8b7(mdo 'grel): spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag
9a1(mdo 'grel): yod par spyod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
9a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de nas pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/
9a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
9a4(mdo 'grel): de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gro bya ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod
9a5(mdo 'grel): pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
9a6(mdo 'grel): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
9a7(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di
9b1(mdo 'grel): dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar
9b2(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la
9b3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
9b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang /
9b5(mdo 'grel): rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho phyogs
9b6(mdo 'grel): logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de dag kun gyi pha rol na/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho la skyong bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems
10a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
10a2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu
10a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'
10a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
10a5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan
10a6(mdo 'grel): dang bral bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
10a7(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams
10b1(mdo 'grel): cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis
10b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur ro / /rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das mya ngan med pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes
10b4(mdo 'grel): rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo de dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i
10b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
10b6(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas
10b7(mdo 'grel): lhan cig kun nas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang /
11a1(mdo 'grel): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
11a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
11a3(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal bcom ldan
11a4(mdo 'grel): 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan
11a5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
11a6(mdo 'grel): gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos
11a7(mdo 'grel): bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa
11b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pa dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /
11b2(mdo 'grel): bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba gang yin
11b3(mdo 'grel): pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong bar byed de/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /
11b4(mdo 'grel): de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
11b5(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
11b6(mdo 'grel): 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
11b7(mdo 'grel): po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba de ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i
12a2(mdo 'grel): blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag
12a3(mdo 'grel): bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad
12a4(mdo 'grel): du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la
12a5(mdo 'grel): pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad
12a6(mdo 'grel): du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
12a7(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
12b1(mdo 'grel): ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu
12b2(mdo 'grel): snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs
12b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba
12b4(mdo 'grel): dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang
12b5(mdo 'grel): na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces
12b6(mdo 'grel): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam
12b7(mdo 'grel): zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo
13a1(mdo 'grel): de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor ro / /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
13a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur
13a3(mdo 'grel): pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba
13a4(mdo 'grel): de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu
13a5(mdo 'grel): 'khod do/ /de nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po
13a6(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug
13a7(mdo 'grel): pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
13b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad
13b2(mdo 'grel): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
13b3(mdo 'grel): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
13b4(mdo 'grel): ston te/ 'di 'dra ba de ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
13b5(mdo 'grel): der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs
13b6(mdo 'grel): dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i
13b7(mdo 'grel): dus la bab par shes na song shig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu
14a1(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs
14a2(mdo 'grel): gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro
14a3(mdo 'grel): zhes smros shig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
14a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /
14a5(mdo 'grel): rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /
14a6(mdo 'grel): spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
14a7(mdo 'grel): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
14b1(mdo 'grel): gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i dbang pos / bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de
14b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas
14b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
14b5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu
14b6(mdo 'grel): mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim
14b7(mdo 'grel): gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge
15a1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
15a2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin
15a3(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi
15a4(mdo 'grel): glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa
15a5(mdo 'grel): dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
15a6(mdo 'grel): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
15a7(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
15b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi shing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
15b2(mdo 'grel): chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po
15b3(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par
15b4(mdo 'grel): gnon pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis
15b5(mdo 'grel): gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de
15b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten
15b7(mdo 'grel): gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
16a1(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs
16a2(mdo 'grel): su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug
16a3(mdo 'grel): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
16a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
16a5(mdo 'grel): 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
16a6(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong
16a7(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang shar gyi
16b1(mdo 'grel): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/
16b2(mdo 'grel): pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa
16b3(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba de nas 'ongs pa
16b4(mdo 'grel): de dag kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
16b5(mdo 'grel): de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
16b6(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa'
16b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pa snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
17a1(mdo 'grel): pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /
17a2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
17a3(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
17a4(mdo 'grel): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
17a5(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing
17a6(mdo 'grel): bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i
17a7(mdo 'grel): slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mo la pad+mo
17b1(mdo 'grel): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo de dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du
17b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das pad+mo dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
17b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
17b4(mdo 'grel): dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog
17b5(mdo 'grel): tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
17b6(mdo 'grel): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya
17b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na
18a1(mdo 'grel): ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
18a2(mdo 'grel): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg
18a3(mdo 'grel): par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /
18a4(mdo 'grel): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
18a5(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/
18a6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang /
18a7(mdo 'grel): khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mo dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
18b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las
18b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
18b3(mdo 'grel): chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin
18b4(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i
18b5(mdo 'grel): dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ni rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol
18b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang shar gyi
18b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de
19a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang
19a2(mdo 'grel): ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur
19a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /
19a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i
19a5(mdo 'grel): dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19a6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang
19a7(mdo 'grel): ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes
19b1(mdo 'grel): smros shig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
19b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su
19b3(mdo 'grel): 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang /
19b4(mdo 'grel): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems
19b5(mdo 'grel): dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu
19b6(mdo 'grel): 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcom
19b7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
20a1(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
20a2(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi
20a3(mdo 'grel): khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis
20a4(mdo 'grel): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi
20a5(mdo 'grel): khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod
20a6(mdo 'grel): par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
20a7(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub
20b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /
20b3(mdo 'grel): dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ni rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen
20b4(mdo 'grel): mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis bcom ldan
20b6(mdo 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag
20b7(mdo 'grel): bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta
21a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs
21a2(mdo 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod
21a3(mdo 'grel): kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gdugs dam pas bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/
21a4(mdo 'grel): ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros
21a5(mdo 'grel): shig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
21a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /
21a7(mdo 'grel): rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
21b1(mdo 'grel): dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod
21b2(mdo 'grel): par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
21b3(mdo 'grel): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
21b4(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa / bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa
21b5(mdo 'grel): 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
21b6(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten
21b7(mdo 'grel): gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can
22a1(mdo 'grel): gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rin chen
22a2(mdo 'grel): mchog dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti
22a3(mdo 'grel): stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
