61b4(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /don dam pa stong pa
61b5(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
61b6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /
61b7(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
62a1(mdo 'grel): kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de bzhin nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol
62a2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos gang
62a3(mdo 'grel): la yang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod
62a4(mdo 'grel): do/ /gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab
62a5(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' lta gang zhig mngon par shes pa thams cad lta gang las yin/ shA ri'i
62a6(mdo 'grel): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis
62a7(mdo 'grel): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran
62b1(mdo 'grel): nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho
62b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
62b3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /
62b4(mdo 'grel): de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis
62b5(mdo 'grel): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu
62b6(mdo 'grel): 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du/ bdag gis lha'i mig gis byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems
62b7(mdo 'grel): can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /
63a1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i
63a2(mdo 'grel): rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di
63a3(mdo 'grel): snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis lho nub kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid
63a4(mdo 'grel): kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
63a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA
63a6(mdo 'grel): ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /
63a7(mdo 'grel): de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs
63b1(mdo 'grel): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu
63b2(mdo 'grel): 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed par brtson pa yin no
63b3(mdo 'grel): zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di'i 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar
63b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa
63b5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang /
63b6(mdo 'grel): tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min gyi
63b7(mdo 'grel): lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
64a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
64a2(mdo 'grel): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
64a3(mdo 'grel): tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba
64a4(mdo 'grel): dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar
64a5(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa kho nar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu
64a6(mdo 'grel): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa
64a7(mdo 'grel): dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung
64b1(mdo 'grel): dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub
64b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
64b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi
64b4(mdo 'grel): nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i
64b5(mdo 'grel): mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can
64b6(mdo 'grel): dang / mi spong ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba
64b7(mdo 'grel): gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig
65a1(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen
65a2(mdo 'grel): ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan
65a3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
65a4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
65a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
65a6(mdo 'grel): po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang
65a7(mdo 'grel): dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su skyong bar byed do/ /
65b1(mdo 'grel): de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu nub byang gi phyogs kyi
65b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min
65b3(mdo 'grel): gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir
65b4(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
65b5(mdo 'grel): shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed
65b6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas
65b7(mdo 'grel): khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas gang
66a1(mdo 'grel): dag yin pa rnams dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi
66a2(mdo 'grel): skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
66a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni tshegs chung ngus gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
66a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
66a5(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du gang zhig chos rnams dang lhan cig ldan pa 'am/ bral ba 'am/ 'du ba 'am/
66a6(mdo 'grel): dbye ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod do zhes sems par byed pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang zhig ldan pa 'am/ bral ba 'am/ 'du ba 'am/ dbye ba'i chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi
66a7(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du bdag gis shin tu myur bar chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on te mi 'gyur zhes
66b1(mdo 'grel): bya bar sems pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
66b2(mdo 'grel): spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'ga' yang chos kyi dbyings las tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos kyi dbyings la chos sna tshogs su yang 'byed par
66b3(mdo 'grel): mi byed la/ de 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings 'di yang 'di ltar rtogs sam mi rtogs snyam du sems pa yang med/ 'di ltar chos gang gis chos de dag rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang des yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do/ /'di ltar des ni chos kyi dbyings la stong
66b4(mdo 'grel): pa'o zhes sbyor bar mi byed mi stong zhes sbyor bar mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
66b5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig gi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la mig gi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /gzugs kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes
66b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /rna ba'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la rna ba'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /sgra'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi
66b7(mdo 'grel): byed/ stong pa nyid la sgra'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /sna'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la
67a1(mdo 'grel): sna'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /dri'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la dri'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la sna'i rnam par
67a2(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /lce'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lce'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /ro'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la ro'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
67a3(mdo 'grel): khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /lus kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lus kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /reg bya'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor
67a4(mdo 'grel): bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la reg bya'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /yid kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/
67a5(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid la yid kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /chos kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes
67a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan
67a7(mdo 'grel): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
67b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni rab ces bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /mchog dang / rab mchog dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang /
67b2(mdo 'grel): gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di ni bla na med pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang / smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson
67b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung ste/ lung du bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur/
67b4(mdo 'grel): yang 'di snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/ /bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/ /bdag gis ni bla
67b5(mdo 'grel): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bral bar mi byed cing gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/ gang
67b6(mdo 'grel): la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba chos kyi dbyings las gzhan pa'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi 'du
67b7(mdo 'grel): shes mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu de ltar
68a1(mdo 'grel): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha
68a2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor te/ des de ma yin pa'i rnal
68a3(mdo 'grel): 'byor rnams zil gyis gnon te gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub bo/ /ser sna'i sems mi skyed do/ /tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems mi skyed
68a4(mdo 'grel): do/ /gnod pa'i sems mi skyed / le lo'i sems mi skyed / rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems mi skyed / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi skyed do zhes bya ba ni chos dkon mchog la gdams pa'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan
68a5(mdo 'grel): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol
68a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am /
68a7(mdo 'grel): dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi dang skal ba mnyam pa
68b1(mdo 'grel): nyid du skyes pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul po yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog par ma yin te/ de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du
68b2(mdo 'grel): mngon du mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gang khyod kyis 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
68b3(mdo 'grel): d pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
68b4(mdo 'grel): rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /
68b5(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de'i dbang po rnams rno bar 'gyur zhing des myur du rnal 'byor 'di 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /
68b6(mdo 'grel): skye ba brjes kyang de la chos zab mo zab mo dag mngon du phyogs par 'gyur te/ des phyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
68b7(mdo 'grel): rnams mnyes par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang dbang po shin tu rno bar 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
69a1(mdo 'grel): sgo thams cad kyang mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyor ba la brtson
69a2(mdo 'grel): par byed pa na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mi mkhas pa'i stobs kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas kyang des nga rgyal du mi byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ /shA ri'i bu
69a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi po rnams sgrub par byed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par byed cing bsam gtan thob pa des kyang lha tshe ring po rnams su skyes te/ de nas shi 'phos nas de gal te 'dod pa'i
69a4(mdo 'grel): khams kyi lha dang mi rnams su skye zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba ni/ de dag gi dbang po rnams rtul por 'gyur zhing rnon por 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan
69a5(mdo 'grel): la yang mnyam par gzhog la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod de/ de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te
69a6(mdo 'grel): dbang po rno ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po rnams skyed de/ tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzugs med
69a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / bsam gtan gyi dbang po dang /
69b1(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa'i dbang po dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar snying rje chen po can thabs mkhas pas gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par skye ba yang yod de/ de dag ni
69b2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa mthong bas thob pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub
69b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
69b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sgom par byed/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par
69b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed cing / de dag gi dbang du mi 'gro bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byas nas des tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ slar yang dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te /
69b6(mdo 'grel): de dag der tshe ji srid du gnas nas dbang po mnyam pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te/ mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
69b7(mdo 'grel): 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug po rnams thob pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi
70a1(mdo 'grel): skye'o / /'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
70a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa drug po thob pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
70a3(mdo 'grel): kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa gang dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
70a4(mdo 'grel): du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba gang yin pa de dag der song nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos
70a5(mdo 'grel): kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa der 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra rnams sgrog par byed cing dkon mchog gsum po rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des de dag
70a6(mdo 'grel): sems dang bar gyur te/ de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
70a7(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas/ yang de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar byed de/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
70b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye ba yang yod do zhes bya ba ni mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
70b2(mdo 'grel): po bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag kyang thabs mkhas pa'i stobs kyis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug
70b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag der gnas shing
70b4(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
70b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas 'phos par 'gyur ba de dag thabs mkhas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'og min gyi bar du skye'o/ /de dag de na yang tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te/ tshangs pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag
70b6(mdo 'grel): der gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba 'debs
70b7(mdo 'grel): par byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi thob pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du thob pa dang / de dag rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i phyir spyod pa
71a1(mdo 'grel): gang dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams thob pa yin yang de dag mngon du mi byed pa dag yod de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bar chad gcig pa yin no/ /
71a2(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / dran pa nye bar
71a3(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam sgom par byed pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
71a4(mdo 'grel): t hob pa dag thabs la mkhas pas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi don byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni bar ma dor yongs su mya
71a5(mdo 'grel): ngan las 'da' ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can gzhal du med grangs med
71a6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni skyes nas
71a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing de dag tu yang sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par 'jog par byed do/ /de
71b1(mdo 'grel): dag sems can rnams kyi don la rtag par brtson te nam yang don med pa'i tshig mi smra'o/ /sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa
71b2(mdo 'grel): grangs med gzhal du med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub
71b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa las yang dag par 'das shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la yang nges par gnas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang bskrun par byed pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu
71b4(mdo 'grel): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
71b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
71b6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/
71b7(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / de bzhin du dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bdug spos dang / mal stan dang / rten ma dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang /
72a1(mdo 'grel): mu tig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / byi ru rnams dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub par byed pa nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rnams rab tu bkod de/ tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams su skyes nas sangs
72a2(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'og min gyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs te/ bsam
72a3(mdo 'grel): gtan rnams las yongs su nyams nas bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams su skye zhing de dag bsam gtan rnams bsgrubs nas 'og min gyi bar du skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
72a4(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'phar ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas gnas gtsang mar skyes te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas gcig gam gnyis las rgal te 'og min du
72a5(mdo 'grel): skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yod do zhes bya ba ni phyed du 'phar ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bdag nyid kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i
72a6(mdo 'grel): sku lta bur sprul nas dga' ldan gyi gnas sbyangs shing tshangs ris kyi lha'i gnas nas 'og min gyi lha'i bar du skyes te/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams la chos ston cing / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la yang chos ston pa dag
72a7(mdo 'grel): yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing bdag nyid kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing
72b1(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma
72b2(mdo 'grel): yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub
72b3(mdo 'grel): dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen
72b4(mdo 'grel): bkur bar byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba dang khyad par du 'phags
72b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
72b6(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang yod do zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan dang / gzugs med par sgrub par byed pa dag tshangs ris nas dge rgyas kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye zhing / de nas
72b7(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar byed de/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug par 'gro ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / gzugs
73a1(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing / de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi 'dod chags
73a2(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing dbang po yongs su dag pa bla na med pa rnams dang ldan te/ nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro
73a3(mdo 'grel): log par ltung ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / bdag nyid la stod par mi byed/ gzhan la smod par mi byed de/ de dag dbang po yongs su dag pa de rnams dang ldan pas skye bo mang po byams shing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis byang chub sems
73a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mthong ba de dag kyang sems rab tu dang ba de nyid kyis theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par
73a5(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /ngag yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis
73a6(mdo 'grel): bdag la mi stod cing gzhan la mi smod pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
73a7(mdo 'grel): ma thob kyi bar du nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su mi skye ba dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi
73b1(mdo 'grel): gtong ba dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin te/ de dag nyid dge
73b2(mdo 'grel): ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rab tu dgod pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya phrag du ma yongs su bzung / 'khor los sgyur
73b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong phrag du ma yongs su bzung ste/ de la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / de'i 'og tu bla na
73b4(mdo 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi thob pa dang /
73b5(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa de dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par
73b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas
73b7(mdo 'grel): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par
74a1(mdo 'grel): 'jug go/ /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de
74a2(mdo 'grel): las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par
74a3(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang
74a4(mdo 'grel): dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pas thod rgal la yang snyoms par 'jug pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni lus kyi mngon sum du byed pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
74a5(mdo 'grel): d pa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba byed cing bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang bral bar mi byed
74a6(mdo 'grel): pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas mi bzhugs shing nyan thos rnams kyang med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do/ /de dag thabs
74a7(mdo 'grel): la mkhas pas srog chags brgya stong bye ba phrag mang po theg pa gsum gyis yongs su smin par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dran pa nye bar
74b1(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag thob pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams thob pa
74b2(mdo 'grel): dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can thams
74b3(mdo 'grel): cad lam la btsud cing rnam par sbyangs nas/ sems can de dag des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag yod de/
74b4(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du ma byas pa gzhan de la rab tu dgod par byed do zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu rnams yin no/ / shA ri'i bu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes dang / spong
74b5(mdo 'grel): ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa yin te zhes bya ba ni rang gis ma thob pa'i chos la gzhan 'god pa yin no/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta
74b6(mdo 'grel): bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub
74b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skal ba bzang po par shes par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa 'di gang la yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu de
75a1(mdo 'grel): lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi go skabs mi dbye'o zhes bya ba 'di dag gis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
75a2(mdo 'grel): dpa'i dge 'dun gsal bar bstan to/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog la gdams pa'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi
75a3(mdo 'grel): las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu 'di la
75a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang gi lus kyi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i lus de ni gang yin/ gang gi ngag gi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i ngag de ni gang yin/ gang gi yid kyi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i yid de ni gang yin snyam pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i
75a5(mdo 'grel): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni lus gang dang / ngag gang dang / yid gang gis ser
75a6(mdo 'grel): sna dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems skyed par byed pa'i lus mi dmigs so/ /ngag mi dmigs so/ /yid mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
75a7(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len bskyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnas med cing go skabs med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas
75b1(mdo 'grel): ngan len sbyong bar byed/ ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len
75b2(mdo 'grel): sbyong ba dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag mi dmigs pa dang / sems mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
75b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas
75b4(mdo 'grel): shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar 'jog pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len
75b5(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/
75b6(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
75b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag mi dmigs pa dang /
76a1(mdo 'grel): yid mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan
76a2(mdo 'grel): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / nyan thos mi dmigs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
76a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam 'dis 'gro zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams la spyod pa ni thub par mi nus pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ma zhen
76a4(mdo 'grel): pa la gdams pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams gzhan thams cad kyis thub pa ma mchis pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
76a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs su mi rlom pa dang / tshor bar mi rlom pa dang / 'du shes su mi rlom pa dang / 'du byed rnams su mi rlom pa dang / rnam par shes par mi rlom pa dang / sa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / chu'i khams
76a6(mdo 'grel): su mi rlom pa dang / me'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / rlung gi khams su mi rlom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / mig gi khams su mi rlom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
76a7(mdo 'grel): khams su mi rlom pa dang / rna ba'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / sgra'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / sna'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / dri'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / lce'i khams su
76b1(mdo 'grel): mi rlom pa dang / ro'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / lus kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang / reg bya'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / yid kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang / chos kyi
76b2(mdo 'grel): khams su mi rlom pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag par mi rlom pa dang / yang dag par spong bar mi rlom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par mi rlom pa dang / dbang por mi rlom pa dang / stobs su mi rlom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan
76b3(mdo 'grel): lag tu mi rlom pa dang / lam du mi rlom pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
76b4(mdo 'grel): par mi rlom pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang / mi 'jigs par mi rlom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi rlom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi rlom pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang / lan
76b5(mdo 'grel): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid du mi rlom pa dang / rang byang chub tu mi rlom pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du mi rlom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rlom pa med pa de
76b6(mdo 'grel): lta na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel te/ sus kyang thub pa med pa yin no/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
76b7(mdo 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ye shes de dang ldan pas ngan song thams cad kyi sgo bcad par 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phongs pa yang nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus
77a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni yongs su mi ngal bar gdams pa'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams
77a2(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes gang dang ldan pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
77a3(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /de dag gis chos bstan pa yang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
77a4(mdo 'grel): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang
77a5(mdo 'grel): mthong ngo / /de dag gis chos bstan pa yang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun la yang bsnyen bkur byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs
77a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do/ /nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /
77a7(mdo 'grel): ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/
77b1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed de/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams su dmigs pa yang med do/ /ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom
77b2(mdo 'grel): par byed de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa yang med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam sgom par byed de/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
77b3(mdo 'grel): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam du dmigs pa yang med do/ /stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub par byed la/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su
77b4(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du yang
77b5(mdo 'grel): rlom pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lam yongs su 'dzin pa la gdams pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mig lnga rab tu thob pa dang yongs su sbyong ba yod do/ /mig gang lnga rab tu thob pa dang yongs su sbyong zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang /
77b6(mdo 'grel): lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
77b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / stong gi bar du mthong ba yod do/ /
78a1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis gling gnyis dang / gling gsum dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
78a2(mdo 'grel): gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /shA'i mig gang gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /sha'i mig gang gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
78a3(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom
78a4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'thab bral gyi lha rnams
78a5(mdo 'grel): kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
78a6(mdo 'grel): kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes
78a7(mdo 'grel): so/ /tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'od chung gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
78b1(mdo 'grel): dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dge chung gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin
78b2(mdo 'grel): pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi
78b3(mdo 'grel): lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'du shes
78b4(mdo 'grel): med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /mi spong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
78b5(mdo 'grel): rab tu shes so/ /legs mthong gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /rab lta'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
78b6(mdo 'grel): rab tu shes so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'phrul
78b7(mdo 'grel): dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshangs ris pa'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshangs 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /
79a1(mdo 'grel): 'od chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /dge chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /
79a2(mdo 'grel): sprin med kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /mi spong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /legs
79a3(mdo 'grel): mthong gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /rab lta'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de dag nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag
79a4(mdo 'grel): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis nub
79a5(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad
79a6(mdo 'grel): kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
79a7(mdo 'grel): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /
79b1(mdo 'grel): nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba
79b2(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i
79b3(mdo 'grel): mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
79b4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/ nyon
79b5(mdo 'grel): mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yang rung ste/ chos gang yang rab tu mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang ma
79b6(mdo 'grel): mthong ma thos/ ma bsams khong du ma chud pa med pa ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa
79b7(mdo 'grel): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gi gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang
80a1(mdo 'grel): zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye
80a2(mdo 'grel): shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /
80a3(mdo 'grel): gnod sems rab tu bsrabs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /de bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spangs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /de bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de
80a4(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / /gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spangs pas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar
80a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o/ / gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas
80a6(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
80a7(mdo 'grel): chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni 'di ltar rab tu shes te/ gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes rab tu shes shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na
80b1(mdo 'grel): dbang po lnga 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar rab tu shes te/ gang zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
80b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa yin te/ de ni de'i lam dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob ste/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa de ni bsams bzhin du bdag gi lus yongs su 'dzin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di
80b3(mdo 'grel): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa yin te/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
80b4(mdo 'grel): rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su
80b5(mdo 'grel): skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'og min gyi bar du skye bar 'gyur te/ de der gnas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gror byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
80b6(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bkur stir byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo / /byang chub sems
80b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag
81a1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
81a2(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
81a3(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin
81a4(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas mchod pa'i bar du mi byed do/ /'dis ni mngon par shes
81a5(mdo 'grel): pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur
