161a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa rtog pa dang po yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
161a2(mdo 'grel): lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
161a3(mdo 'grel): ni ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis pa skye mched du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/
161a4(mdo 'grel): rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan
161a5(mdo 'grel): zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
161a6(mdo 'grel): reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
161a7(mdo 'grel): sems/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
161b1(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan
161b2(mdo 'grel): zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
161b3(mdo 'grel): lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma
161b4(mdo 'grel): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so/ /
161b5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa khams su btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/ /
161b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid
161b7(mdo 'grel): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa
162a1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan la
162a2(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ /bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
162a3(mdo 'grel): lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
162a4(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o/ bcom
162a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o zhes bya ba ni/ de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
162a6(mdo 'grel): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa rnam par byang bar btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/ / bcom ldan
162a7(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
162b1(mdo 'grel): pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa mthong ba'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
162b2(mdo 'grel): pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa bsgom pa'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
162b3(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa brgyad pa khyad par gyi lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no/ /
162b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /
162b5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
162b6(mdo 'grel): te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
162b7(mdo 'grel): ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa
163a1(mdo 'grel): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma
163a2(mdo 'grel): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg
163a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/
163a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das
163a5(mdo 'grel): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
163a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos
163a7(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
163b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ci sgyu ma la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
163b2(mdo 'grel): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
163b3(mdo 'grel): mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
163b4(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
163b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ thams cad shes pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /
163b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
163b7(mdo 'grel): 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes pa dang / kun shes pa dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/
164a1(mdo 'grel): rnam par byang ba dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing kun shes pa med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang /
164a2(mdo 'grel): tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
164a3(mdo 'grel): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de/ ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /
164a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
164a5(mdo 'grel): ltar lags na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par
164a6(mdo 'grel): bgyi ste/ 'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
164a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin du phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu'o/ /rmi lam yang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin lags te/ dmigs su ma mchis
164b1(mdo 'grel): so/ /de bzhin du phung po lnga po dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes
164b2(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma
164b3(mdo 'grel): mchis pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin du mig yor dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du phung po lnga po ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis na dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
164b4(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga'o/ /de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis mi
164b5(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du bshad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig mi zhum/ kun tu mi zhum/ 'gyod
164b6(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag /kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ lam shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rjes su thob par 'gyur
164b7(mdo 'grel): bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgu pa mi slob pa'i lam du btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste 'dzin rtog gnyis pa'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
165a1(mdo 'grel): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos nas zhum zhing kun tu zhum la 'gyod de/ dngang ba dang / kun tu skrag pa dang / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub
165a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thabs mi mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar ma gyur na ni dngang zhing kun tu skrag la skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
165a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gang la spyod pas mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag /kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di
165a4(mdo 'grel): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
165a5(mdo 'grel): tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces bya
165a6(mdo 'grel): bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
165a7(mdo 'grel): par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya sar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
165b1(mdo 'grel): kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong
165b2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar rtog / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa
165b3(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
165b4(mdo 'grel): dben zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
165b5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i sems kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
165b6(mdo 'grel): pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul du chos ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
165b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi bzod pa dang / 'dod pa dang so sor rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
166a1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi de mi 'dor ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
166a2(mdo 'grel): pa can de dag nyid kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'am/ mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
166a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag /kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ro// //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
166a4(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa
166a5(mdo 'grel): ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid tshor ba'o/ /'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid 'du shes so/ /'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed rnams nyid stong pa nyid/
166a6(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid nyid 'du byed rnams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid de / stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid stong pa nyid / stong pa nyid nyid mig
166a7(mdo 'grel): go/ /rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'o/ /sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'o/ /lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid
166b1(mdo 'grel): lce'o/ /lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus so/ /yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid stong
166b2(mdo 'grel): pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so/ /sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sgra'o/ /dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid dri'o/ /ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid
166b3(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid ro'o/ /reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid reg go/ /chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
166b4(mdo 'grel): kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong
166b5(mdo 'grel): pa nyid nyid rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa
166b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin gyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /
166b7(mdo 'grel): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi
167a1(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg
167a2(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
167a3(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
167a4(mdo 'grel): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te
167a5(mdo 'grel): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa
167a6(mdo 'grel): nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te
167a7(mdo 'grel): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /
167b1(mdo 'grel): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
167b2(mdo 'grel): gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar
167b3(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis
167b4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
167b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa yin no/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
167b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis yongs su bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos nas mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag /kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
167b7(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
168a1(mdo 'grel): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
168a2(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
168a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
168a4(mdo 'grel): ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la
168a5(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba
168a6(mdo 'grel): dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
168a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya
168b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
168b2(mdo 'grel): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang /
168b3(mdo 'grel): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/
168b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
168b5(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
168b6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi
168b7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
169a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
169a2(mdo 'grel): gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben
169a3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
169a4(mdo 'grel): su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
169a5(mdo 'grel): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
169a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
169a7(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
169b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
169b2(mdo 'grel): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
169b3(mdo 'grel): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
169b4(mdo 'grel): gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams
169b5(mdo 'grel): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
169b6(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
169b7(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
170a1(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des
170a2(mdo 'grel): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos nas / mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag /kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170a3(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba thabs mi mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig lags/
170a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/
170a5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
170a6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/
170a7(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
170b1(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas
170b2(mdo 'grel): par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa
170b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa
170b4(mdo 'grel): dang / rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed
170b5(mdo 'grel): cing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
170b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
170b7(mdo 'grel): la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su
171a1(mdo 'grel): byed pa dang / gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra
171a2(mdo 'grel): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs
171a3(mdo 'grel): te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
171a4(mdo 'grel): mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid
171a5(mdo 'grel): kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul
171a6(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa
171a7(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te
171b1(mdo 'grel): reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
171b2(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i bar nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
171b3(mdo 'grel): la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes
171b4(mdo 'grel): bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
171b5(mdo 'grel): la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing
171b6(mdo 'grel): nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams
171b7(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar
172a1(mdo 'grel): yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa
172a2(mdo 'grel): phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba
172a3(mdo 'grel): dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed cing nang
172a4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa
172a5(mdo 'grel): dang bral bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po
172a6(mdo 'grel): dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
172a7(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sgom par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
172b1(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la/ skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa gang gis
172b2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa thos nas/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la skrag pas zin par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos zin par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
172b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
172b4(mdo 'grel): dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi / 'di la bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o / /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi
172b5(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig
172b6(mdo 'grel): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las bzlog cing mos pa
172b7(mdo 'grel): med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas
173a1(mdo 'grel): khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
173a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /
173a3(mdo 'grel): lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtog pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa dag ston te/ 'grel to / /rnam
173a4(mdo 'grel): par 'byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas
173a5(mdo 'grel): shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang
173a6(mdo 'grel): mi nus so zhes zer ba ni 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa'
173a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po de'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg
173b1(mdo 'grel): dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag
173b2(mdo 'grel): gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi
173b3(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid
173b4(mdo 'grel): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
173b5(mdo 'grel): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
173b6(mdo 'grel): dang / lam rnams nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub
173b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom
174a1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang
174a2(mdo 'grel): shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes
174a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba yang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing
174a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa
174a5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las
174a6(mdo 'grel): bzlog cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
174a7(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la nyan thos kyi sa mngon du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par
174b1(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas
174b2(mdo 'grel): shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rkang lag dang
174b3(mdo 'grel): mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar
174b4(mdo 'grel): yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa'
174b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
174b6(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar
174b7(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
175a1(mdo 'grel): dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
175a2(mdo 'grel): bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa
175a3(mdo 'grel): dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang /
175a4(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
175a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa
175a6(mdo 'grel): dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
175a7(mdo 'grel): bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa
175b1(mdo 'grel): dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
175b2(mdo 'grel): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
175b3(mdo 'grel): ston pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par
175b4(mdo 'grel): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag
175b5(mdo 'grel): med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /de
175b6(mdo 'grel): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa gnyis pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no/ /'di dag gis nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag bzhi
175b7(mdo 'grel): bstan to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
176a1(mdo 'grel): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub la ni skye ba 'am/ yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa 'am dmigs pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub
176a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med pa'o zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rang gi ngo bo yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
176a3(mdo 'grel): dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
176a4(mdo 'grel): don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang /
176a5(mdo 'grel): gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni drod du gtogs pa'i rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
176a6(mdo 'grel): na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
176a7(mdo 'grel): tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la gnas med cing mi
176b1(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa'i rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du
176b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de
176b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin
176b4(mdo 'grel): du 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
176b5(mdo 'grel): don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
176b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /
176b7(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la
177a1(mdo 'grel): tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
177a2(mdo 'grel): bu'i sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
177a3(mdo 'grel): bu'i lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
177a4(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab
177a5(mdo 'grel): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
177a6(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni bzod par gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no/ / //bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin
177a7(mdo 'grel): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /
177b1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
177b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
177b3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched
177b4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
177b5(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
177b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
177b7(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
178a1(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab
178a2(mdo 'grel): 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
178a3(mdo 'grel): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
178a4(mdo 'grel): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
178a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin
178a6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
178a7(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi
178b1(mdo 'grel): gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rten bstan pa yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di
178b2(mdo 'grel): lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag
178b3(mdo 'grel): pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
178b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
178b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /de
178b6(mdo 'grel): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'gag
178b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang 'byung ba dang dmigs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
179a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /
179a2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ / gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
179a3(mdo 'grel): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing
179a4(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
179a5(mdo 'grel): chos rnams kyi bar dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
179a6(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
179a7(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shin tu dben pa'i phyir gzugs la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /shin tu dben pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
179b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shin tu dben pa'i phyir/ skye mched dang /
179b2(mdo 'grel): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba so so ba dang / bsdus pa rnams la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing
179b3(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing
179b4(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
179b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing
179b6(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa
179b7(mdo 'grel): la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba
180a1(mdo 'grel): dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
180a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gnas
180a3(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal
180a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i
180a5(mdo 'grel): phyogs spong ba'i rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
180a6(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab
180a7(mdo 'grel): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
180b1(mdo 'grel): shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de
180b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
