180b3(mdo 'grel): dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /
180b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa spong ba'i rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di
180b5(mdo 'grel): lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang snying rje'i
180b6(mdo 'grel): rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
180b7(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
181a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas
181a2(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi go rims kyi rten yin no/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
181a3(mdo 'grel): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
181a4(mdo 'grel): cing mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa ma yin mi ldan pa ma yin te/ gzugs med pa dang / bstan du
181a5(mdo 'grel): med pa dang / thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi chags pa med pa nyid dang / yod par gyur pa ma yin
181a6(mdo 'grel): pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ye shes lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i rten yin no/ / 'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i rten bstan to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/
181a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar chos thams cad kyi yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
181b1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha
181b2(mdo 'grel): na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong ba dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
181b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos chos 'di dag rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni
181b4(mdo 'grel): phar shes pa dang / mar shes pa dang / dge sbyong du shes pa dang / bram zer shes pa dang / rigs kyi rgan pa la rim gror byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms
181b5(mdo 'grel): pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs
181b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba pa'i 'du shes dang / rus pa pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa pa'i 'du shes dang /
181b7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge
182a1(mdo 'grel): 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa
182a2(mdo 'grel): dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos zhes brjod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni
182a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub mo dang / ngag 'khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang /
182a4(mdo 'grel): 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba'i chos zhes brjod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom
182a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lung du ma bstan pa'i lus kyi las dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i ngag gi las dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i yid kyi las dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i dbang po lnga dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i skye mched
182a6(mdo 'grel): drug dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs med pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rnam par smin pa thams cad de/ de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes brjod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom
182a7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
182b1(mdo 'grel): dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan gang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos gang dag yin pa ste/ 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes brjod do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
182b2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam
182b3(mdo 'grel): par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med
182b4(mdo 'grel): la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs la lta ba
182b5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
182b6(mdo 'grel): nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
182b7(mdo 'grel): 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad med do snyam pas ci yang med pa'i skye mched nye
183a1(mdo 'grel): bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa
183a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu
183a3(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas
183a4(mdo 'grel): nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang
183a5(mdo 'grel): ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs sdug
183a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang
183a7(mdo 'grel): dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
183b1(mdo 'grel): yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad med do snyam pas cung zad med pa'i skye mched
183b2(mdo 'grel): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang
183b3(mdo 'grel): dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /
183b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
183b5(mdo 'grel): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
183b6(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
183b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i
184a1(mdo 'grel): chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang /
184a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang khams gsum par ma gtogs pa'i chos gang cung zad yod pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos
184a3(mdo 'grel): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi mngon pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma
184a4(mdo 'grel): yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings/ chos gnas pa nyid / chos nges pa nyid / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/
184a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
184a6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
184a7(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad
184b1(mdo 'grel): la chags par mi bya zhing / chos thams cad ni gnyis su med pa'i tshul du rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i dmigs pa bstan pa yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
184b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba gang brjod pa ci'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur
184b3(mdo 'grel): ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po de gang lags/ bcom ldan
184b4(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
184b5(mdo 'grel): dang / sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
184b6(mdo 'grel): chen po ni de'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed do/ /sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur bar bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed
184b7(mdo 'grel): pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du bdag gis 'khor ba dpag tu med pa sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha bgos nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar byas so / /
185a1(mdo 'grel): bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems
185a2(mdo 'grel): can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs par bya ba yin no/ /bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos
185a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad rjes su rtogs pa thams cad du song ba la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rnams kyi tshul gcig tu mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi
185a4(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par sgrub pa rtogs pa'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la
185a5(mdo 'grel): bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di
185a6(mdo 'grel): ni gang la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
185a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de bdag gis nyams su myong bar
185b1(mdo 'grel): bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya ba ni/ 'di ltar ji srid du/ sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
185b2(mdo 'grel): stong mang por de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam zhing tshul 'di nyid kyis sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya
185b3(mdo 'grel): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad nyams su myong bar byas te/ de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
185b4(mdo 'grel): brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs bsags nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed
185b5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed pa gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar bya ba rlabs po che'i sems su bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
185b6(mdo 'grel): chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni 'di yin te/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed / zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed / gti mug gi sems mi bskyed / brtse ba'i sems mi bskyed / nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi
185b7(mdo 'grel): bskyed pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du byed kyang des rlom sems su mi byed pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul
186a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba nyid ni 'di yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis
186a2(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems
186a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yin pa des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang la gnas na sems can gyi tshogs
186a4(mdo 'grel): chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos la dga' ba dang /
186a5(mdo 'grel): chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos la
186a6(mdo 'grel): dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos sgom zhing mang du byed pa gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos la kun dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba dang / kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ mngon par sbyor ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga'
186a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang / chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur ba de mi dmigs pa'i
186b1(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/
186b2(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/
186b3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi
186b4(mdo 'grel): sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam
186b5(mdo 'grel): par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ste / rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
186b6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos 'di dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba yin no/ /des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni/ sems can
186b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi mchog nyid du sems dpa'i sems chen po nyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang
187a1(mdo 'grel): spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod pa la khyod spobs par byos shig /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems
187a2(mdo 'grel): can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / skye ba por lta ba dang / gso bar lta ba dang / skyes bur lta ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang /
187a3(mdo 'grel): yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba dang /
187a4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar lta ba dang / byang chub rnam par rtog par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos
187a5(mdo 'grel): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rnams te/ lta ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
187a6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar
187a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul
187b1(mdo 'grel): gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do / /de bzhin du rgya cher skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i bar du
187b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
187b3(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / yi ge rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis
187b4(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
187b5(mdo 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur
187b6(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/
187b7(mdo 'grel): lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to zhes bya ba ni spong ba chen po nyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
188a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems dang mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang
188a2(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems/ zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i sems gang lags pa de la yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/ chags pa ma mchis pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
188a3(mdo 'grel): po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma lags te/ des na de la chags pa ma mchis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
188a4(mdo 'grel): po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
188a5(mdo 'grel): chos 'ga' yang skye ba'am/ 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'phel ba 'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med cing
188a6(mdo 'grel): 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
188a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa khong du chud pa med pa'i
188b1(mdo 'grel): sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes gang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad
188b2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten
188b3(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bar yang chags pa med pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang chags pa med do / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
188b4(mdo 'grel): kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cing khong du chud pa med pa zhes gang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa
188b5(mdo 'grel): so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma
188b6(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
188b7(mdo 'grel): phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med
189a1(mdo 'grel): cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de
189a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
189a3(mdo 'grel): yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
189a4(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang
189a5(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba yang tshor ba med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes med pa la chags pa med pa yin
189a6(mdo 'grel): nam/ 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi
189a7(mdo 'grel): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de
189b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med pa yin no / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par
189b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba so so ba dang / bsdus pa rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
189b3(mdo 'grel): dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha
189b4(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir
189b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa chen po nyid do/ /'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i ched du bya ba bstan to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub
189b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
189b7(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen por yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags te/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la
190a1(mdo 'grel): 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi don du spyod pa
190a2(mdo 'grel): na sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub kyi don du spyod pa na sems can nyi tshe ba zhig gi
190a3(mdo 'grel): don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sems can
190a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /
190a5(mdo 'grel): sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su bcad pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
190a6(mdo 'grel): po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
190a7(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis kyang
190b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya/ gzhan yang de dag la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
190b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya ba
190b3(mdo 'grel): ni bsgrub pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no/ / //bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
190b4(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su
190b5(mdo 'grel): gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang /
190b6(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yid la byed pa spong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
190b7(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gtong ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la brjod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa
191a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson
191a2(mdo 'grel): 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
191a3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub
191a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su
191a5(mdo 'grel): gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi dmigs/ sbyin par bya ba yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
191a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa de dag
191a7(mdo 'grel): la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste dang po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
191b1(mdo 'grel): y ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
191b2(mdo 'grel): tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
191b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi bskyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul
191b4(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di
191b5(mdo 'grel): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha
191b6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
191b7(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192a2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang
192a3(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
192a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
192a5(mdo 'grel): drug po'i go cha ste gnyis pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
192a6(mdo 'grel): thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
192a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
192b1(mdo 'grel): mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
192b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang nges pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha
192b3(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
192b4(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
192b5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha
192b6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos
192b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
193a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha ste
193a2(mdo 'grel): gsum pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
193a3(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa'i
193a4(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
193a5(mdo 'grel): bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
193a6(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
193a7(mdo 'grel): chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs
193b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
193b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
193b3(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193b4(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
193b5(mdo 'grel): te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
193b6(mdo 'grel): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha
193b7(mdo 'grel): chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste bzhi pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
194a1(mdo 'grel): bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
194a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
194a3(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
194a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
194a5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
194a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
194a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di
194b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad
194b2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa
194b3(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
194b4(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i 'du shes nye bar
194b5(mdo 'grel): gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
194b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/
194b7(mdo 'grel): de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste lnga pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
195a1(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par
195a2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
195a3(mdo 'grel): cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
195a4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
195a5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la de ltar bzod la mos shing rtog pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
195a6(mdo 'grel): shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
195a7(mdo 'grel): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
195b1(mdo 'grel): byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
195b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
195b3(mdo 'grel): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195b4(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed de/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
195b5(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
195b6(mdo 'grel): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi pha rol tu
195b7(mdo 'grel): phyin pa drug po 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed/ mi dmigs pa de ltar na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur ba yin no/ /tshe dang
196a1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re res gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha ste drug pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa
196a2(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myong bar mi byed/ de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin/ de bzhin du tshad med pa dang /
196a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang de dag gi ro myong bar mi byed/ de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur/ de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol [(]tu
196a4(mdo 'grel): tu [,]tu [)]phyin pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas
196a5(mdo 'grel): gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du byed pa ma yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des na
196a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrogs par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
196a7(mdo 'grel): che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go zhes bya ba ni drug
196b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i go cha'i mjug bsdu ba'o/ /go cha'i sgrub pa bstan zin to// //shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / theg pa chen po la 'dzeg par 'gyur ba yin/ gang
196b2(mdo 'grel): pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba
196b3(mdo 'grel): can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched
196b4(mdo 'grel): dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
196b5(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa 'di dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
196b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
196b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang /
197a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma yid la byed pas
197a2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub
197a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/ theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/ /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs
197a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa yin no/ / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
197a5(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
197a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/
197a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
197b1(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas pa na 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / rtogs pa dang / nges par sems par byed pa 'di ni/
197b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
197b3(mdo 'grel): rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
197b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems
197b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med
197b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtogs kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom sems
197b7(mdo 'grel): su mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug
198a1(mdo 'grel): pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
198a2(mdo 'grel): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom par byed pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
198a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam la 'jug pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/
198a4(mdo 'grel): khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing / nye bar
198a5(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med
198a6(mdo 'grel): pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing / nye bar
198a7(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing bdag gis sems can thams
198b1(mdo 'grel): cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed/ snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba la gzhol bar byed/ dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can dga' bar bya'o zhes
198b2(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams la gzhol bar byed/ btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / sems can rnams zag pa zad pa la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
198b3(mdo 'grel): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
198b4(mdo 'grel): su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
198b5(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi bskyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bzod pa dang / 'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i
198b6(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di
198b7(mdo 'grel): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog la/
199a1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
199a2(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog
199a3(mdo 'grel): cing / rnam par ldang ba la / de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
199a4(mdo 'grel): kyi skyon med par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa la 'jug
199a5(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
199a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa gang yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
199a7(mdo 'grel): chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
199b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
199b2(mdo 'grel): pa yod pa dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i
199b3(mdo 'grel): dus la shes pa mi 'jug / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ de gsum po 'di gsum la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /
199b4(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
199b5(mdo 'grel): la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
199b6(mdo 'grel): dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang /
199b7(mdo 'grel): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la sbyor ba'i 'jug pa'o/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems
200a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang / des
200a2(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa po dang / len pa po dang / sbyin pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de lta na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi
