276b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
276b4(mdo 'grel): brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
276b5(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i
276b6(mdo 'grel): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
276b7(mdo 'grel): sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can
277a1(mdo 'grel): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs
277a2(mdo 'grel): te / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems
277a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// //bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i
277a4(mdo 'grel): mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
277a5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa chen po zhes bya
277a6(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni mtha' las 'das par nges par 'byung ba yin no/ / de nas tshe dang
277a7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs so/ /
277b1(mdo 'grel): legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi
277b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gzhal du ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mchis pa rnams kyang
277b3(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o / /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
277b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad
277b5(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to/ /brnyes so/ /brnyes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
277b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par sems so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg
277b7(mdo 'grel): pa chen po bstan par ma gyur pa lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa med de/ rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos byang chub
278a1(mdo 'grel): kyi phyogs gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
278a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan
278a3(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i
278a4(mdo 'grel): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
278a5(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po
278a6(mdo 'grel): dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi brjed pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyis rnam par spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi
278a7(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
278b1(mdo 'grel): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin
278b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
278b3(mdo 'grel): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang
278b4(mdo 'grel): yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
278b5(mdo 'grel): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos
278b6(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
278b7(mdo 'grel): rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
279a1(mdo 'grel): pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
279a2(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
279a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i
279a4(mdo 'grel): chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams
279a5(mdo 'grel): cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa bstan du med pa / thogs pa med pa / mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste mtshan nyid med par ro/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston
279a6(mdo 'grel): to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po yang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
279a7(mdo 'grel): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de / de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su
279b1(mdo 'grel): byar med do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul
279b2(mdo 'grel): gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
279b3(mdo 'grel): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya
279b4(mdo 'grel): ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
279b5(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi bar yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs
279b6(mdo 'grel): des na theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
279b7(mdo 'grel): to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te/ gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'
280a1(mdo 'grel): kun du mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi
280a2(mdo 'grel): ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam
280a3(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du byas te/ bcom
280a4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis
280a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos rnams la/ gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs lta yang ga la mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa lta yang ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags
280a6(mdo 'grel): so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags la/ mngon par ma grub pa zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi ba'am/
280a7(mdo 'grel): mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar dmigs su ma mchis na/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum yongs su mi 'jum/
280b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi 'jigs/ mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
280b2(mdo 'grel): ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ dbus su dmigs su med pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
280b3(mdo 'grel): kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa'
280b4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du de ltar byang chub sems
280b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe
280b6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du bdag bdag ces bgyi yang bdag ni shin tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis
280b7(mdo 'grel): so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la gzugs mngon par grub pa lta yang ga la mchis/ tshor
281a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta yang ga la mchis/ gang mngon par ma grub pa ni gzugs ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
281a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi 'am zhes smra / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par
281a3(mdo 'grel): ma grub pa las gud na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/ yongs su
281a4(mdo 'grel): mi 'jum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
281a5(mdo 'grel): bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
281a6(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang
281a7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir
281b1(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sems can med pa yang gzhan/ sems can stong pa yang gzhan/
281b2(mdo 'grel): sems can dben pa yang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin med pa yang gzhan zhig la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na sems can
281b3(mdo 'grel): med pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
281b4(mdo 'grel): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
281b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs
281b6(mdo 'grel): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
281b7(mdo 'grel): mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
282a1(mdo 'grel): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
282a2(mdo 'grel): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir
282a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
282a4(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
282a5(mdo 'grel): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
282a6(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid
282a7(mdo 'grel): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
282b1(mdo 'grel): dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
282b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
282b3(mdo 'grel): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang /
282b4(mdo 'grel): dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye mched dang /
282b5(mdo 'grel): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams
282b6(mdo 'grel): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams
282b7(mdo 'grel): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang /
283a1(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched
283a2(mdo 'grel): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams
283a3(mdo 'grel): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
283a4(mdo 'grel): bu skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
283a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
283a6(mdo 'grel): de ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
283a7(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
283b1(mdo 'grel): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
283b2(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
283b3(mdo 'grel): phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i
283b4(mdo 'grel): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
283b5(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
283b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
283b7(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin
284a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
284a2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
284a3(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
284a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
284a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
284a6(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
284a7(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
284b1(mdo 'grel): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
284b2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so / /phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs / dbus mi dmigs te/
284b3(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa
284b4(mdo 'grel): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
284b5(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
284b6(mdo 'grel): gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
284b7(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
285a1(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
285a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
285a3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang
285a4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /
285a5(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
285a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
285a7(mdo 'grel): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med
285b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
285b2(mdo 'grel): mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
285b3(mdo 'grel): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
285b4(mdo 'grel): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
285b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar
285b6(mdo 'grel): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
285b7(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
286a1(mdo 'grel): yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
286a2(mdo 'grel): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad
286a3(mdo 'grel): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid
286a4(mdo 'grel): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
286a5(mdo 'grel): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang
286a6(mdo 'grel): dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
286a7(mdo 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs
286b1(mdo 'grel): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
286b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan
286b3(mdo 'grel): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar
286b4(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
286b5(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
286b6(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
286b7(mdo 'grel): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
287a1(mdo 'grel): dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas
287a2(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
287a3(mdo 'grel): yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir
287a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags
287a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
287a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
287a7(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
287b1(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan
287b2(mdo 'grel): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
287b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang
287b4(mdo 'grel): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
287b5(mdo 'grel): dang / dbus su byang chub sems dpa' nye bar mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings med pa dang / de bzhin nyid med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i
287b6(mdo 'grel): mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus rnams mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin med pa nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i
287b7(mdo 'grel): bar du med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
288a1(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
288a2(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus kyang gzhan ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin med pa gang yin pa nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid
288a3(mdo 'grel): med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
288a4(mdo 'grel): dang / dbus rnams dmigs su med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan
288a5(mdo 'grel): thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos
288a6(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo
288a7(mdo 'grel): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
288b1(mdo 'grel): so/ /rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// //bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
288b2(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub
288b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /
288b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas stong pa nyid
288b5(mdo 'grel): dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
288b6(mdo 'grel): mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nyan thos med
288b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te/ shA ri'i bu med pa yang gzhan
289a1(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ stong pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
289a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na nyan thos med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben
289a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
289a4(mdo 'grel): mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus rnams su mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba dgag pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o / /tshor ba
289a5(mdo 'grel): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
289a6(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang
289a7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
289b1(mdo 'grel): mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kun du mtha' yas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
289b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
289b3(mdo 'grel): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta
289b4(mdo 'grel): ste dper na/ nam mkha' la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas
289b5(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun du
289b6(mdo 'grel): mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
289b7(mdo 'grel): lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ stong pa nyid la
290a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' med/ stong pa nyid la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med/ stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
290a2(mdo 'grel): lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/
290a3(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
290a4(mdo 'grel): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid med/
290a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med
290a6(mdo 'grel): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
290a7(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam
290b1(mdo 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
290b2(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /chos kyi dbyings
290b3(mdo 'grel): ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong / de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong / thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong / lam
290b4(mdo 'grel): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ / nyan thos kyi theg
290b5(mdo 'grel): pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong / nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong / rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas
290b6(mdo 'grel): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bar du med/ nyan thos med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
290b7(mdo 'grel): ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams
291a1(mdo 'grel): cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad du smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs
291a2(mdo 'grel): la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du shes la med cing mi
291a3(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la
291a4(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
291a5(mdo 'grel): byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs
291a6(mdo 'grel): so/ /sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang / rna ba dang / sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang / rna ba dang /
291a7(mdo 'grel): sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
291b1(mdo 'grel): yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med
291b2(mdo 'grel): cing mi dmigs so/ /dri ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dri ni gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ro ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / sgra
291b3(mdo 'grel): dang dri dang ro ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos
291b4(mdo 'grel): ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
291b5(mdo 'grel): la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi
291b6(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa
291b7(mdo 'grel): ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa
292a1(mdo 'grel): dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i
292a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid
292a3(mdo 'grel): kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
292a4(mdo 'grel): mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te
292a5(mdo 'grel): reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i
292a6(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni
292a7(mdo 'grel): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus
292b1(mdo 'grel): kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i
292b2(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te
292b3(mdo 'grel): reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
292b4(mdo 'grel): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
292b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
292b6(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg
292b7(mdo 'grel): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
293a1(mdo 'grel): ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi
293a2(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te
293a3(mdo 'grel): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
293a4(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
293a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
293a6(mdo 'grel): las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi
293a7(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
293b1(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs kyi sgo la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgo la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ni ting nge 'dzin la
293b2(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yang dag par spong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi bar ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang
293b3(mdo 'grel): dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
293b4(mdo 'grel): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi bar rnams la med cing mi dmigs pa de de dang gzhan rnams la yang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
293b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la med cing mi dmigs
293b6(mdo 'grel): so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan ni bsam gtan la med cing mi dmigs so/ / bsam gtan ni tshad med pa la med cing
293b7(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so'i skye
294a1(mdo 'grel): bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
294a2(mdo 'grel): sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thams cad
294a3(mdo 'grel): shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad
294a4(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar ni de bzhin
294a5(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub
294a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing
294a7(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni byang chub
294b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad med cing dmigs su med pas byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba las thob pa po dgag pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan
294b2(mdo 'grel): pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ces smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
294b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad kyi ming ni phyogs bcu po rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro/ /gang du yang mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro/ /gar yang mi gnas so/ /
294b4(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang mi 'gro/
294b5(mdo 'grel): gang na yang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa rnams ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni
294b6(mdo 'grel): ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ skye mched ces bya ba dang / khams zhes bya ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni
294b7(mdo 'grel): gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro/ /gang na yang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni skye mched ma yin/ khams ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid gang yin pa
295a1(mdo 'grel): de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di ni ming tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ming la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/
295a2(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
295a3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do/ /
295a4(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang nang stong
295a5(mdo 'grel): pa nyid med/ nang stong pa nyid la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo
295a6(mdo 'grel): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis
295a7(mdo 'grel): ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/
295b1(mdo 'grel): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka
295b2(mdo 'grel): yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
295b3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /
295b4(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin
295b5(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
295b6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di
295b7(mdo 'grel): lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang
296a1(mdo 'grel): yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du dper na/ bdag bdag ces brjod kyang bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub po zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/
